title: Happy New Year Song Lyrics Kavan
stanzas:
Happy New Year Song Lyrics From #Kavan
#HipHopTamizha #TRajender

Happy Happy New Year-u
prachanai ellaam over-u.
oyaama vela senja
kilinjidumda drawer-u

Happy Happy New Year-u
prachanai venaam poyiru
Yaar enna sonnaal enna
ishtam pola nee iru

happy happy happy happy
naan romba romba
romba happy (2)
Ippo paaru..

rakkaakkaa rakkara rakkara
rakkaakkaa rakkara rakkara
rakkaakkaa rakkara rakkara
rakkara raa

kavalaiya marakkalaam
rekkaiya virikkalaam
paravaiya polathaan
skyla parakkalaam

happy happy happy happy
naan romba romba
romba happy

palasa erikkalaam
pudhusaa porakkalaam
moraikkura aalu kitta
eelichi kaattalaam

happy happy happy happy
naan romba romba
romba happy

vazhkai seiyyum soozhchithaan
naama illa poochithaan
saguni aattam aadi
paarpaomaa

varusam porakkum podhuthaan
pudhusa maarum neramthaan
ilasum podisum onnaa
saeruvomaa

attack-u panravare
attrackku panravare
assaultu panravare
neethaanyaa
yenya

anbaala vendravare
panbaala nindravare
ennaalum enga thala
neethaayaa
podhum ya!!

happy happy happy happy
naan romba romba
romba happy (2)

Happy Happy New Year-u
prachanai ellaam over-u.
oyaama vela senja
kilinjidumda drawer-u

Happy Happy New Year-u
prachanai venaam poyiru
Yaar enna sonnaal enna
ishtam pola nee iru

Are you ready?
Get on the dane floor
one shot machchaan
ippa paarty-ellam
nadakkudhaa

two shots
you know me now
ellaam ennakuthaan

three shots
boys dancing all
around me

I got four shots
everybody gotta
get it in.

hey hey hey
common common girls!!(2)

hey hey hey
vada vada machi!! (2)

hey hey hey
poduren paaruu switchi

arivurai solla
theriyaadhu enakku
arakora moola
kidaiyaadhu unakku

aasa podum dhinam
thappu kanakku.
adhai adakki
aanduputtaa
vettri unakku

edhu rightu
edhu wrongu
yosikkaamalae
un heartu
adhu beatu
pogum nikkaamalae

thinam worku
adhil tension
yena sikkaamalae
kavaliya marangadaa
mazhalaiyaa irungadaa

attack-u panravare
attrackku panravare
assaultu panravare
neethaanyaa

anbaala vendravare
panbaala nindravare
ennaalum enga thala
neethaayaa

Happy New Year Ya!!
happy yaa!!
ava avanukku
aegirum BP ya

ye podu podu podu
varen paaru
rekkara rekkara(4)

vaada vaada machi
rekkara rekkara

poduren paaru
switchi
rekkara rekkara
Happy New Year Ya!!

vaada !!
Vaada !!
Vaada !!
rakkara rakkara raa
really happy yaa!!
happy neaw year ya!!

seo.title: Happy New Year Song Lyrics Kavan
